intro: Solve logical riddles in this simple, yet challenging game based on the classic star battle format.
description:
Find-o'-lantern is a simple and addictively easy logic game, inspired by the classic star battle puzzle. Your mission is to place jack-o'-lanterns on a square board, following rules that exercise your mind in problem-solving.

With 180 levels ranging in difficulty, Find-o'-lantern offers a perfect blend of simplicity and complexity. Each puzzle requires careful thought and planning as you work to place the lanterns in their correct positions. Its intuitive interface will get you up and running, while increasing difficulty will ensure seasoned puzzle enthusiasts a satisfying challenge.

Key Features:
- 180 levels of logic-based puzzles
- Simple rules with deep strategic potential
- Increasing difficulty to keep you engaged
- Clean and intuitive interface—designed with the puzzle lover in mind

If you love logic puzzles and classic solitaire challenges, Find-o'-lantern is the game to exercise your gray matter!
